install.name: WordPress Updated Blogs
install.author: Rafael Corral
install.description: This module will show the x amount of the latest updated blogs.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: limit
param.label: Number of blogs to show:
param.description: Number of latest updated blogs to show.

param.name: show_all_blogs
param.label: Show all blogs
param.description: If this option is selected, the module will not show updated blogs, instead it will display all blogs also ignoring the limit parameter.
